text: Ba ʙa jod ored, ej ʙani Isroil, on zamonro, ki ʙo sumo pajmoni saxt ʙastem, ki imon ʙa Alloh ored va jagona Uro iʙodat kuned va kuhi Turro ʙar ʙoloi saraton ʙidostem. Va ʙaroi sumo guftem: On ciro, ki ʙa sumo dodaem, mustahkam ʙigired, vagarna kuhi Turro ʙar ʙolojaton sarnagun sozem va on ciro, ki dar on ast, ʙa xotir ʙidored! To ʙuvad, ki parhezgor ʙosed
